name: matriarch
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a powerful woman in a family : The matriarch of the Smyth family was Margaret. Irene, the 47-year-old matriarch of the family, was found alone in the kitchen.
the female leader of a society in which power passes from mother to daughter
